mapper.insert: insert into today values( today_seq.nextval, #{order_no}, #{branch_no}, #{today_num}, sysdate, #{total_price}, '0', #{price_status})
mapper.select: select order_no from today where to_char(today_time, 'YYYY-MM-dd') = to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-dd') and rownum = 1
mapper.update: update today set status='1' where order_no=#{order_no} and branch_no=#{branch_no}
mapper.select: select O.*, T.today_num,T.today_time,T.total_price,T.status,T.price_status from burger_order O inner join today T on O.order_no=T.order_no where O.branch_no=#{branch_no} and to_char(T.today_time,'YY/MM/DD')=to_char(sysdate)

select G.order_no,G.bm_no,G.count,M.menu_no,M.menu_name from burger_order O inner join today T on O.order_no=T.order_no inner join goods G on O.order_no=G.order_no inner join branch_menu B on G.bm_no=B.bm_no inner join menu M on B.menu_no=M.menu_no where G.order_no=#{order_no} and to_char(T.today_time,'YY/MM/DD')=to_char(sysdate)
select branch_name from branch where branch_no=#{branch_no}
